Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); UNKNOWN; 26TH DYNASTY (not after)
Name: Head of a statue of Osiris
Description: Head of a statue of Osiris wearing the white crown, with carved features and inlaid eyes made of various materials: bronze lids, calcite eyeballs, obsidian iris and pupil. There are four mortises for the tenons of two plumes on the left and right of the crown, and three mortises for the tenons of a uraeus on the front.
